function.name: note
function.description: Run when there is a message that needs to be noticed by the developer or needs to be remembered(including user reports, too funny message).

message.description: The message content that needs to be noted.

function.name: get_user
function.description: Obtain detailed information of the specified user.Including user introduction, nickname and the latest video name of this user.If no parameters are passed in, the default response is the user's own details.

function.name: change_title
function.description: Change the name of the video.Do not use in situations that are not very, very important.This is very dangerous.

title.description: The new name of the video.

function.name: pass
function.description: Run when the given two sentences are coherent and without any illegal or insulting statements
